body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling abc, a premier art gallery. My name is Keith Turner. May I know your name, please?

Hi Keith, I'm Jacqueline Turner.

Thank you, Jacqueline. How can I assist you today?

I'm quite frustrated with the billing error I noticed on my recent invoice.

I apologize for the inconvenience, Jacqueline. Could you please provide me with your invoice number so I can look into it?

Yes, the invoice number is zero zero one two three four.

Thank you. Can you also confirm the amount you were billed incorrectly?

Sure, the incorrect amount is five zero zero dollars instead of two zero zero dollars.

I appreciate your patience, Jacqueline. I'll investigate this and ensure it's resolved quickly. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

Thank you, Keith. I hope it gets sorted soon.

You're welcome, Jacqueline. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
